entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
